item.title: Facebook Ads Editor - VSL in Health Niche - Upwork
item.description:

https://www.facebook.com/ads/library/?active_status=all&ad_type=all&country=US&view_all_page_id=107580105023479&sort_data[direction]=desc&sort_data[mode]=relevancy_monthly_grouped&search_type=page&media_type=all

Please look at the example links above and how they structure their ads and content and please let me know and apply if you are the right fit by SHOWING ADS YOU HAVE CREATED IN THIS FORMAT.

Skills:
-Proficient in Capcut or Premiere Pro (Preferabl Capcut)
-Gathering relevant B-roll footage for VSL ads (VERY IMPORTANT)
-Understanding scripts and the nature of content needed to be made
-High converting and quality ad creation skills
-More relevant experience

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00

Skills: Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Copywriting, Video Editing

item.title: Video Production for Instagram and TikTok - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video producer to transform our filmed footage into engaging content that aligns with our brand style for Instagram and TikTok. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of social media trends and the ability to create visually appealing videos that capture and retain viewers' attention.
        Responsibilities:
        - Edit and enhance raw footage to create polished videos
        - Add relevant music, text, graphics, and transitions
        - Ensure videos are optimized for Instagram and TikTok platforms
        - Incorporate brand guidelines and maintain consistency throughout
        - Collaborate with the marketing team to develop creative concepts and ideas
        Skills:
        - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
        - Strong knowledge of social media platforms and trends
        - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
        - Creative mindset with the ability to think outside the box
        - Excellent communication and collaboration skills
        Size: Medium
        Duration: 1 to 3 months
        Expertise: Intermediate
If awarded we will want 40 videos packaged.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 21, 2024 22:01 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Adobe After Effects
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Creative Youtube Video Creator Wanted - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a creative Youtube video creator to create one (1) faceless Youtube video.

I will provide the script. You will create a slick video based on my script. It will be narrated by a realistic sounding AI voice that you will provide. I am also looking for a thumbnail to be made for the video.

The topic of this video is football, so if you are comfortable working with sports - namely American football - that is even better. I will be looking to highlight the statistics mentioned in this video via text during the video.

I would also like to make sure that there are no copyright issues and that this video will fall under fair use.

Please post a few examples of your Youtube work as well.

Thanks!

Budget: $75
Posted On: June 21, 2024 21:53 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, MOV, Documentary, Nonfiction, Concept Video, Narrated Presentation, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Videography
Skills: MP4, MOV, Documentary, Nonfiction, Concept Video, Narrated Presentation, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Videography
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Simple Project: Transfer Videos From One Platform To Another - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone for a very simple project of downloading videos from one platform and uploading them to another platform. You must have good wifi speed and have excellent organizational skills to keep track of the videos you're transferring to make sure all videos have been successfully transferred over. There are approximately 500 videos that are small in length and MB. Each video is on average 5 minutes long. I tested downloading and uploading some myself and you should be able to do 8-10 videos per hour.

I would love for the work to be completed in 2-3 weeks.

Please note: the project price is not a placeholder, so please do not apply to this job if you don't agree with the project price.

If you're interested please apply.

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 21, 2024 21:47 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Data Entry, WordPress, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Web Development
Skills: Data Entry, WordPress, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Web Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Whiteboard/Explainer Video Editor For Christian YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented whiteboard/Explainer Video Editor to join our team & assist us with our CHRISTIAN YouTube channel.

The ideal candidate will have a passion for storytelling, a strong understanding of CHRISTIAN teachings, and the ability to create visually appealing and informative videos. This role involves turning scripts and voiceovers into compelling visual narratives that resonate with our audience.

Responsibilities:
- Create engaging whiteboard and explainer videos based on provided scripts and voiceovers.
- Use AI to generate voiceovers when needed.
- Collaborate with the content team to ensure videos align with our vision.
- Incorporate images, animations, and transitions to enhance storytelling.
- Maintain a consistent and visually appealing style.
- Edit videos to meet deadlines and high-quality standards.
- Implement feedback to refine and improve content.
- Stay updated on video editing and animation trends.

Requirements:
- Experience in creating whiteboard and/or explainer videos.
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Camtasia).
- Strong understanding of Christian teachings.
- Attention to detail and creative problem-solving skills.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects.
- Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate remotely.
- Portfolio showcasing previous work.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with Christian, religious, educational content or similar.
- Basic graphic design skills (e.g., Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop).
- Familiarity with YouTube optimization.

Start your cover letter with the word RELIGION,  and include a link to your previous work.

Compensation: $20/video
No of videos : 3 videos/week (12 Videos / month)
                                                                             
Link to sample video: https://youtu.be/tzLS4O7YaUg?si=nb0K1y_AeKI4-dXd

NOTE: Only those who start their cover letter with the word RELIGION would be considered for next steps.

Budget: $240
Posted On: June 21, 2024 21:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Animation
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Animation
Country: Canada
click to apply
